name: registrations_view_only_links_read
description:
Retrieves the details of a view only link created from this registration.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested view only link, if the request is successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.
#### Permissions

View only links on a registration, public or private, are readable and writeable only by users that are administrators on the registration.

registration_id.description: The unique identifier of the registration.

link_id.description: The unique identifier of the view only link.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the view only link entity.
**anonymous**: Whether or not the view only link has anonymized contributors (default: true)
**date_created**: The time at which the view only link was created, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.
**name**: The name of the view only link (default: Shared project link)
**id**: The unique identifier of the view only link.
**relationships**: URLs to other entities or entity collections that have a relationship to the view only link entity.
**creator**: A relationship to the user who created this view only link.
**nodes**: A relationship to the nodes which this view only link gives read-only access to.
**type**: The type identifier of the view only link ('view-only-links').
